summary: Minimalist e-commerce website for HIZE, a premium fashion brand. Features clean product catalog, brand story section, shopping cart functionality, and sophisticated minimalist design with smooth navigation.
architectural_notes: Single-page HTML with sticky navigation and smooth scroll behavior
Minimalist design system: Helvetica Neue font stack, neutral color palette (#1a1a1a, #fcfcfc, #e5e5e5)
CSS Grid and Flexbox for responsive layouts
Placeholder product images and campaign shots (to be replaced with actual assets)
known_issues: Shopping cart (BAG) functionality not yet implemented - currently displays static count
Product images are placeholders, need actual product photography
Hero section background needs hero image URL
Navigation menu hidden on mobile without hamburger menu implementation
No individual product detail pages yet
